short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: GoTeacher is a Google Classroom add-on that automates sharing and feedback collection.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: GoTeacher is designed to save teachers time with sharing digital resources and increase student engagement.  The main role of the extension is to allow teachers to share content with their students in Google Classroom instantly, while monitoring student engagement in these materials. The extension provides a convenient and streamlined solution for teachers to keep track of their students' progress and facilitate a more collaborative learning environment.
